name: Clinch and Control
description: Develop close-range control techniques to dominate an opponent in the clinch.

cards.title: Double Collar Tie
cards.description: A dominant clinch position that allows control over the opponent’s head movement.
bulletpoints: Grip the back of the opponent’s head with both hands
Keep elbows close together to maintain control
Use head movement to prevent counterattacks
cards.summaryText: Lock the double collar tie tight with closing elbows and steer their head to smother counters.

cards.title: Inside Clinch Control
cards.description: A positioning technique that allows control over the opponent’s upper body while avoiding strikes.
bulletpoints: Position one arm under the opponent’s shoulder
Use hip movement to stay balanced
Look for opportunities to land knee strikes
cards.summaryText: Swim inside the clinch, ride the hips for balance, and punctuate control with sharp knees.
